name: Raï
description: Originated in Algeria in the 1920s as a form of Bedouin Music, blending influences from various rural and urban genres.

children.name: Pop Raï
children.description: Fuses melodic sensibilities into the traditional Raï structure, with increased utilization of synthesizers, guitars, and drum machines.

children.name: Pop Raï
children.description: Fuses melodic sensibilities into the traditional Raï structure, with increased utilization of synthesizers, guitars, and drum machines.

children.name: Traditional Raï
children.description: Original folk of the popular Algerian Raï, combining various rural and cabaret styles with Bedouin rhythms.
